entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
